document.full_text: rod blagojevich's long-winded testimony in his corruption retrial drew harsh criticism from a federal judge wednesday, who took the unusual step of ordering the defense to end their examination of the former illinois governor without delay.
document.title: judge tell long-winded blagojevich to wrap up testimony
lines_and_colors: rod blagojevich's long-winded testimony in his corruption retrial drew harsh criticism from a federal judge wednesday, who took the unusual step of ordering the defense to end their examination of the former illinois governor without delay.
